document.full_text: two policemen and 15 militants were killed after more than 100 insurgents stormed a security post near peshawar on tuesday night, one of the heaviest attacks in recent months.
document.title: checkpoint in pakistan is stormed by militants
lines_and_colors: two policemen and 15 militants were killed after more than 100 insurgents stormed a security post near peshawar on tuesday night, one of the heaviest attacks in recent months.
